sentences.sentence: If these principled relations among brain parts hold true, then Boskops would have had not only an impressively large brain but an inconceivably large prefrontal cortex.
sentences.translation: 如果这一推论正确，那么博斯·科普人种将不不仅有一颗令人印象深刻的大脑袋，他们还将拥有大的不可思议的前额叶皮层。

sentences.sentence: However, not inconceivably, it was “parasitic” even 3000 years ago.
sentences.translation: 然而，并非不可思议的是，甚至在3000年以前这b就是“寄生”的了。

sentences.sentence: It would have been inconceivably dangerous even if he had known how to set about doing it.
sentences.translation: 这种事，哪怕他知道如何着手，也危险得不可思议。
